Class bartMachineClassificationMultThread

java.lang.Object
bartMachine.Classifier
bartMachine.bartMachineRegressionMultThread
bartMachine.bartMachineClassificationMultThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class bartMachineClassificationMultThread extends bartMachineRegressionMultThread implements Serializable
This class handles the parallelization of many Gibbs chains over many CPU cores to create one BART regression model. It also handles all operations on the completed model.
See Also:

    • Evaluate

      public double Evaluate(double[] record, int num_cores_evaluate)
      Predicts the best guess of the class for an observation
      Overrides:
      Evaluate in class bartMachineRegressionMultThread
      Parameters:
      record - The record who's class we wish to predict
      num_cores_evaluate - The number of CPU cores to use during this operation
      Returns:
      The best guess of the class based on the probability estimate evaluated against the classification_rule

    • getGibbsSamplesForPrediction

      protected double[][] getGibbsSamplesForPrediction(double[][] data, int num_cores_evaluate)
      This returns the Gibbs sample predictions for all trees and all posterior samples. This differs from the parent implementation because we convert the response value to a probability estimate using the normal CDF.
      Overrides:
      getGibbsSamplesForPrediction in class bartMachineRegressionMultThread
      Parameters:
      data - The data for which to generate predictions
      num_cores_evaluate - The number of CPU cores to use during this operation
      Returns:
      The predictions as a vector of size number of posterior samples of vectors of size number of trees
